title: A Bible Believer Looks At World History - Frederick Widdowson
description:
This is a review of world history from a Bible believer's perspective from the beginning through World War Two. It is designed for use by homeschoolers but anyone can learn from it. Each chapter has a list of study questions and a sample quiz taken from those questions. These are the basics of World History up to the Second World War.


About the author:
Frederick Widdowson is a 59 year old grandfather who teaches boxing and kickboxing at a local boxing club. He haa a Masters Degree in American History from American Public University. He's currently studying Ancient and Classical History through American Military University.

For several years he taught home-schooled children as a tutor in World History, American History, and Civics. Not able to find any textbooks that he felt gave the Bible its proper due he has written his own.

Most importantly he is a Bible Believing Christian who has read the King James Bible through 59 times. Fred and his amazing wife, Beth, live near Gettysburg, Pa
